mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , TITLE , WRITER , DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS regDate , CNT , SECURITY , (SELECT count(*) FROM comment WHERE comment.parent_seq = board.seq) AS commentCnt FROM BOARD ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT #{i},10;
SELECT SEQ , TITLE , WRITER , DATE_FORMAT(regDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS regDate , CNT , SECURITY , CONTENT FROM BOARD WHERE seq = ${seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CNT = IFNULL(CNT,0) +1 WHERE SEQ = ${seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE SEQ = ${seq}; DELETE FROM COMMENT WHERE PARENT_SEQ = ${seq}
